name: Alabataye
description:
In Alabataye, you follow the adventures of a knight in search of the Holy Grail. But this knight is completely stupid, so it will be up to you to save him from his own temerity!

This character will have to cross each of the 12 levels by passing over the actions you ask him to perform: change direction, attack, take a short break... Without this, he will run into a wall or an enemy and the level will start again. On the way, take the time to collect clues to find the Holy Grail!

You can play the game for free and give us feedback, it will give us strength and allow us to improve it! Have fun!

(On the menu, clic on the Alabataye Production logo for a little survey, it's not very long but it's very important for us)
